contextId.information: This refers to the drink offerings that are required to accompany each of the animals when they are sacrificed. AT: "the drink offerings that are offered with them" or "the drink offerings that accompany them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_possession]])

This refers to the grain offerings that are required to accompany each of the animals when they are sacrificed. AT: "the grain offerings that are offered with them" or "the grain offerings that accompany them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_possession]])

This refers to the offerings the priests were to give every day. The grain offering and drink offering were to be offered with the regular burnt offering. AT: "the regular burnt offering, with the grain offering and drink offerings that accompany it" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_possession]])
contextId.quote: the regular burnt offering, its grain offering, and its drink offerings

contextId.information: The grain offering was to be offered with the burnt offering. The drink offerings were to be offered with both the sin offering and the burnt offering. AT: "along with the grain offering and the drink offerings that accompany them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_possession]])
contextId.quote: its grain offering, and their drink offerings

contextId.information: The grain offering was to be offered with the burnt offering. Drink offerings were to be offered with both the sin offering and the burnt offering. AT: "along with the grain offering and the drink offerings that accompany them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_possession]])
contextId.quote: its grain offering, and their drink offerings

contextId.information: These offerings were to be offered with the bull, the ram, and the lambs. AT: "the grain offerings and the drink offerings" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_possession]])
contextId.quote: their grain offering and their drink offerings
